english: He gave full particulars of the stolen property .
chinese: 他详细列出全部被盗的财物。

english: The house has twice been burgled .
chinese: 这屋子已经两次被盗了。

english: The stolen painting must be recovered at any cost .
chinese: 无论如何要把被盗的画找回来。

english: The police are onto him about the stolen paintings .
chinese: 警方正在追查他与被盗画的事。

english: The stolen painting must be recovered at any cost ...
chinese: 无论如何要把被盗的画找回来。
被盗造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: The number of cars stolen in this city last month ran into 60 .
chinese: 这个城市上月被盗汽车的数目达到60辆。

english: The police are onto him about the stolen paintings
chinese: 警方正在追查他与被盗画的事

english: My ie homepage had been hijacked , what should i do
chinese: 我的ie主页被盗,我应该怎么做

english: She went home only to find her house burglarized
chinese: 她回到家里，发现房子被盗了。

english: By the reparations of pilfer be 80 % what press risk
chinese: 被盗的赔款是按保险额的80 % 。

english: People can always claim their key was stolen
chinese: 人们总是可以声明他们的密钥被盗。

english: This is ridicuious . you say the egg wiii be stoien
chinese: 这真荒谬，你说加冕蛋将会被盗

english: When the fox preaches , take care of your geese
chinese: 谚语狐狸在说教，当心鹅被盗。

english: He facilitated the theft of a military - grade nerve gas ,
chinese: 他促使军用神经毒气被盗

english: Police restored the stolen jewels to the showroom
chinese: 警方将被盗的珠宝交还给了陈列室
